history.content:
The last day to declare (for the semester) is the last day of lecture.

The only problem is that you won't have priority for getting in upper divs, if you are not declared CS. The best advice would be to finish up your last pre-req ASAP and declare, so you won't have to worry about being blocked from getting in.

If I am planning on double majoring in CS and Cog Sci, and I am already declared in Cog Sci, is there a certain deadline for me to declare the CS major? I will be a junior in the fall and wondering if I can finish my last pre-req (math 54) in my junior year spring or senior year fall and just start taking Cog Sci and CS upper divs.
history.subject: Deadline to declare CS major?
